attributes.action: ban members of parliment employing family members
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: members of the parliment should not be able to employ family members using the tax payers money, unless these people are interveiwed by an independent body to prove they are qualified to do the job. and proof is supplied of their working hours.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
